html:
2015 IWLCA Division II All Americans Announced - 48 Are Honored

 

The Intercollegiate Women’s Lacrosse Coaches Association has honored 48 student-athletes with a selection on the IWLCA Division II All-America teams for 2015. The IWLCA will honor the National All-Americans at the IWLCA All-American banquet on Saturday, June 6, 2015 at the Radisson Hotel Valley Forge in King Prussia, Pa.


First Team:

Megan Asper, Florida Southern College, Senior., Midfield

Brittany Ast, University of New Haven, Senior, Defense

Chrissy Baffuto, Lock Haven University, Junior Redshirt, Goalkeeper

Gabrielle Barowski, Florida Southern College, Junior, Defense
